symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.description: Elevated body temperature above normal.
symptoms.management: Rest, hydration, and over-the-counter fever reducers.

symptoms.name: Cough
symptoms.description: Expelling air from the lungs with a sudden, sharp sound.
symptoms.management: Cough syrup, hydration, and avoiding irritants.

symptoms.name: Headache
symptoms.description: Pain in the head or upper neck.
symptoms.management: Pain relievers, rest, and stress reduction.

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.description: Feeling of tiredness or lack of energy.
symptoms.management: Adequate sleep, balanced diet, and regular exercise.

symptoms.name: Sore Throat
symptoms.description: Pain or irritation in the throat.
symptoms.management: Saltwater gargles, throat lozenges, and hydration.

symptoms.name: Nausea
symptoms.description: Feeling of sickness with an inclination to vomit.
symptoms.management: Ginger, hydration, and avoiding strong odors.

symptoms.name: Diarrhea
symptoms.description: Frequent loose or liquid bowel movements.
symptoms.management: Hydration, probiotics, and avoiding dairy.

symptoms.name: Chest Pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the chest area.
symptoms.management: Immediate medical attention, rest, and medications.

symptoms.name: Shortness of Breath
symptoms.description: Difficulty breathing or feeling suffocated.
symptoms.management: Inhalers, oxygen therapy, and avoiding allergens.

symptoms.name: Rash
symptoms.description: Area of irritated or swollen skin.
symptoms.management: Topical creams, antihistamines, and avoiding irritants.

symptoms.name: Joint Pain
symptoms.description: Discomfort, aches, or soreness in the joints.
symptoms.management: Pain relievers, anti-inflammatory medications, and rest.

symptoms.name: Dizziness
symptoms.description: Feeling lightheaded or unsteady.
symptoms.management: Hydration, lying down, and monitoring blood sugar levels.

symptoms.name: Abdominal Pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the abdomen.
symptoms.management: Antacids, rest, and avoiding certain foods.

symptoms.name: Swelling
symptoms.description: Enlargement of body parts due to fluid accumulation.
symptoms.management: Elevation, compression, and ice packs.

symptoms.name: Numbness
symptoms.description: Loss of sensation in a part of the body.
symptoms.management: Physical therapy, medications, and addressing underlying conditions.

symptoms.name: Blurred Vision
symptoms.description: Lack of sharpness of vision.
symptoms.management: Corrective lenses, surgery, and managing underlying conditions.

symptoms.name: Earache
symptoms.description: Pain in the ear.
symptoms.management: Pain relievers, warm compresses, and decongestants.

symptoms.name: Itching
symptoms.description: Uncomfortable sensation on the skin causing the urge to scratch.
symptoms.management: Antihistamines, topical creams, and avoiding triggers.

symptoms.name: Loss of Appetite
symptoms.description: Decreased desire to eat.
symptoms.management: Small, frequent meals, appetite stimulants, and addressing underlying conditions.

symptoms.name: Weight Loss
symptoms.description: Unintentional loss of body weight.
symptoms.management: Nutritional support, addressing underlying conditions, and monitoring.
